laboratory_examinations.findings: Mercury concentration 876 mg/kg in herbs taken (normal limit <0.5 mg/kg), serum concentration 23.2 ng/mL (normal <2.5 ng/mL), urine concentration 14.8 ng/mL (normal limit <10 ng/mL)
Protein level 3+ at 6.0 g/L, urinary N-acetyl b-D glucosamine (NAG) level at 27.5 U/24 hours
Serum mercury level dropped to 3.1 ng/mL, urinary level dropped to 3.9 ng/mL
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum and urinary mercury levels decreased significantly after 60 days of chelation therapy.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Protein level 1+ at 2.5 g/L, urinary NAG level 14.5 U/24 hours
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Residual proteinuria remained one month after discharge.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Increased theta activity and decreased alpha activity
Bilateral decrease in peroneal nerve compound motor action potential amplitude
